item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, February 25, 2025 at 1:25 PM UTC
item.description:

15. It’s still worth blogging in the age of AI (245 points | 145 comments)

23. Fidelity down. Money and Stocks and Support unavailable (8 points | 3 comments)
